DOC.brief_title: Imipramine Treatment Patients With Multi-organ Bodily Distress Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study test effect Imipramine patient multi-organ Bodily distress syndrome ( BDS ) . BDS unifying diagnosis encompasses group closely related condition somatization disorder , fibromyalgia , irritable bowel syndrome chronic fatigue syndrome . The project consist double-blinded placebo control trial treatment tricyclic antidepressant Imipramine dosages 25-75 mg. Primary outcome patient-rated improvement measure Clinical Global Improvement Scale ( CGI-I ) . Secondary outcome functional level ( physical , mental social ) measure SF-36 Physical Component Summary ( PCS ) . The study require 140 participant study duration 19 week patient . End point 13 week , i.e . 10 week 25-75 mg study drug .
